cancelMove: Cancel the effects of the move
discardAssets: Discard an asset you control| Discard {count} assets you control
discardCardsWithMatchingIcons: Discard cards with at least 1 {'{'}{skillIcon}{'}'} icon | Discard cards with at least {count} {'{'}{skillIcon}{'}'} icons
discardAllCardsFromHand: Discard all cards in your hand
discardCardsFromHand: Choose and discard 1 card from your hand | Choose and discard {count} cards from your hand
discardCardsFromHandUpTo: Choose and discard up to 1 card from your hand | Choose and discard up to {count} cards from your hand
discardRandomCardsFromHand: Discard 1 random card from your hand | Discard {count} random cards from your hand
discardTopOfYourDeck: Discard the top card of your deck | Discard the top {count} cards of your deck
doNotSpendClues: Do not spend a clue | Do not spend {count} clues
drawTopCardOfEncounterDeck: Draw the top card of the encounter deck | Draw the top {count} cards of the encounter deck
minusToYourNextSkillTestThisRound: You get -{count} to your next skill test this round
placeAgendaDoom: Place 1 doom on the current agenda. | Place {count} doom on the current agenda.
placeAgendaDoomCanAdvance: Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance. | Place {count} doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.
placeCluesOnYourLocation: Place 1 of your clues on your location | Place {count} of your clues on your location
placeDoomOn: Place 1 doom on {name} | Place {count} doom on {name}
removeAgendaDoom: Remove 1 doom from the current agenda | Remove {count} doom from the current agenda
takeHorrorForEachPointOfFailure: Take 1 horror for each point you failed by | Take {count} horror for each point you failed by
